sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_8186
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: BIL_SetBILExtDefaultValues ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/BUILTINLIST/c/src/BuiltInList.c line 228
Requirement is not verified The Built-in List shall have a static size of 256 list elements.
Remark: Node-Addresss may be not unique, since one ECU might be connected to more than one bus.
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_8186 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

simplesect.para: Requirement is not satisfied

Requirement is not verified 0x0502 - Content Liste
Dynamic Content Liste shall be readable via 0x22 ReadDataByIdentifier 0x0502. 0x0502 shall return "Dynamic part" of the ContentList which contains 16 elelments of 3 Bytes each: - Bus ID (1 Byte) - Node ID (2 Bytes)
Dynamic part of Content Liste shall be writeable via 0x2E WriteDataByIdentifier 0x0502. 0x0502 shall require data payload equal 96 bytes.
Remark: More information on configuration details and buffer layout of adaptation 0x0502 can be found in SWR_ICAS1_GW_11193
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_10917 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

Node-Address Bus ID Node-Address Bus ID 0x010 0x01 0x084 0x00 0x00A 0x00 0x08C 0x00 0x00C 0x00 0x08F 0x00 0x00E 0x12 0x096 0x00 0x012 0x00 0x097 0x00 0x013 0x00 0x098 0x00 0x014 0x62 0x099 0x00 0x015 0x00 0x09E 0x00 0x01B 0x00 0x09D 0x00 0x023 0x00 0x0AE 0x00 0x02C 0x00 0x0B3 0x61 0x031 0x00 0x0B8 0x00 0x032 0x00 0x0B9 0x00 0x033 0x00 0x0BA 0x6A 0x034 0x00 0x0C9 0x00 0x03B 0x00 0x101 0x00 0x03E 0x00 0x102 0x00 0x03F 0x00 0x103 0x00 0x044 0x00 0x104 0x00 0x046 0x00 0x105 0x00 0x047 0x00 0x106 0x00 0x04A 0x00 0x107 0x00 0x04B 0x00 0x108 0x62 0x04C 0x00 0x109 0x00 0x04D 0x00 0x10C 0x00 0x04E 0x00 0x00E 0x23 0x04F 0x61 0x014 0x24 0x053 0x00 0x04F 0x21 0x057 0x61 0x057 0x21 0x064 0x00 0x067 0x23 0x067 0x63 0x069 0x21 0x069 0x61 0x0B3 0x24 0x06F 0x00 0x0BA 0x23 0x072 0x00 0x073 0x24 0x073 0x62 0x108 0x24 0x076 0x00 0x07B 0x00 0x07C 0x00
Remark: In the static part of Content list nodes which are connected to more than one bus, have a Bus-ID != 0. Static part od Content List cannot be read via diagnostic services. The Static part can cover all the ContentList ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_10918 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

simplesect.para: Requirement is not satisfied

Requirement is not verified The ICAS1 shall be able to differentiate up to 256 Bus-IDs (including VLANs). (Bus interface coded in 1Byte)
Remark: The Bus-ID 0x00 is used for undefined Bus-IDs. This allows to "reserve" a position for the node in the Built-in List list, without the need to define explicitly in which bus it will be connected. For these nodes, the Bus-ID will be defined in the Built-in Liste during run-time, taking this information from the KN_ Frames or NMH_ Frames.
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_10919 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM
Requirement is not satisfied

Requirement is not verified Step 1 - Reset the Built in List
If at least one of following conditions is met: - system startup, - update of the Content List by DID 0x0502 than Built-In List shall perform following actions: - reset KN and NM timeout timers, - reset all parameters to the init values, except sollverbau, - reset all currently set Timeout DTC's
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_11998 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_11999
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: BIL_ProcessContentList ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/BUILTINLIST/c/src/BuiltInList.c line 298
Requirement is not verified Step 2 - Index calculation
Perform index calculation for each Built-in List node address NOT equal to 0, sequentially: - the static part is hashed first, - the dynamic part is hashed after (all elements introduced using write request of DID 0x0502),
Built-in List shall ensure protection of data modification during every update or reset process. - update state (prevent parameters modifcation) is set during stete 1 and state 2, or any internal operations on BIL are performed. - normal state (allowing parameters modification) is set after step 2 of Built-in List is finished, or internal operations on BIL are finished
Remark: phrase 'Internal operatons' used here means: modification of Built-in List parameters performed by Built-in List component.
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_11999 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

simplesect.para: Requirement is not satisfied

Requirement is not verified Step 3 - Complete the Built-in List by diagnosis frames
In this state also the ICAS1 will learn new elements from the KN_ and NMH_ frames (in the meaning of obtaining positions), which were not contained in the Built-in List.
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_12000 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_8211
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: BIL_NmhRcvCb ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/BUILTINLIST/c/inc/BuiltInList.h line 495 Requirement is satisfied here: BIL_KnRcvCb ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/BUILTINLIST/c/inc/BuiltInList.h line 536
Requirement is not verified Obtention of the Node-Address from KN_ or NMH_ frames
The ICAS1 shall obtain the Node-Address from the received KN_ or NMH_ frames as per following:
for CAN or CANFD The Node-Address are the first 10 bits (Byte order: Little-endian) from the "Identifier" for the KN_ and NMH_ frames - PDU-ID KN_ : 0x17F00 / Node-Address / NM_ : 0x1B000 / Node-Address /
for VLAN The Node-Address are the first 10 bits from the (Byte order: Little-endian) from the "Identifier" - started from bit 16th, for the KN_ and NMH_ frames
- PDU-ID KN_ : 0x5 / Node-Address / 0C00 NM_ : 0x02 / Node-Address / 0C00
Example: Instrument Cluster (Kombi in German) Is connected to KCAN (0x12) and Komfort VLAN (0x64)
KCAN: KN_Kombi > Identifier = 0x17F00 014 NMH_Kombi > Identifier = 0x1B00 014
VLAN: KN_Kombi> PDU-ID: 0x50140C00 NM_Kombi> PDU-ID: 0x20140C00
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_8211 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

simplesect.para: Requirement is not satisfied

Requirement is not verified Generation or completion of entries in the Built-in List with signals from KN_frames during State 2
As long as the Built In List is in State 2, whenever it receives a KN_Frame from ECU "xxx", it shall perform the following: - perform Index Computation with the Frame's Node-Address / Bus-ID, - in the Built-in List, set the parameters of the item at position index as per the result of the Index Computation above, as per the following table
Determination of the Bus-ID parameter for each Built-in List entry based on KN_frames:
KN_frames received via CAN: The Bus-ID depends on the phisical bus where the KN_ frame is received.
KN_frames from ECUs connected on VLAN: Bus-ID Information available in the ethernet KN_frame.
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_8212 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM
Requirement is not satisfied

Requirement is not verified As long as the ICAS1 is in State 2, whenever the system recognizes a timeout for KN_ frames which correspond to one list element in the Built-in List, the ICAS1 shall set the corresponding Istverbaut parameter to 0 ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_8213 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM
Requirement is not satisfied

Requirement is not verified Generation or completion of entries in the Built-in List with signals from NMH_frames during State 2
As long as the Built In List is in State 2, whenever it receives a NMH_Frame from ECU "xxx", it shall perform the following: - perform Index Computation with the Frame's Node-Address / Bus-ID, - in the Built-in List, set the parameters of the item at position index as per the result of the Index Computation above, as per the following table
Determination of the Bus-ID parameter for each Built-in List entry based on NMH_frames:
NMH_frames received via CAN: The Bus-ID depends on the phisical bus where the NMH_ frame is received.
NMH_frames from ECUs connected on VLAN: Bus-ID Information available in the ethernet NMH_frame. ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_8214 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_8216
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: BIL_IndexComputation ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/BUILTINLIST/c/src/BuiltInList.c line 563
Requirement is not verified When performing Index Computation for a given pair of Node-Address "k" and Bus-ID "b", the ICAS1 shall, recursively and up to a maximum of 15 times (j=[0,14]), apply the hash function to "k" until the Node Address of the Built-in List's item numbered as per the result of the hash function is equal to 0x000h or "k" AND the Bus ID of the Built-in List's item numbered as per the result of the hash function is either equal to 0x00h or to "b".
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_8216 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

simplesect.para: Requirement is not satisfied

Requirement is not verified Double Hashing: Whenever the calculated position is already in use, and the Node-Address+ Bus-ID does not match, then If j<14, then j shall be incremented the hash function shall be recalculated
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_8218 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM
Requirement is not satisfied

Requirement is not verified [Hash function]
Whenever the ICAS1 applies the Hash function to a Node-Address "k", it shall perform the following calculation:
- k: Node-Address - K: ICAS1 Node-Address = 0x010h - m: Size of the Built-in Liste (Hash table) = 0x100h - j: Recursion level (For Double Hashing)
H(j,k) ::= ( h1(k) + j*h2(k) ) mod m
h1(k) ::= ( ( m + k - K ) mod m ) h2(k) ::= ((k + 64) mod m/2 ) | 1
Remark: In C language implementation of h2(k) extra pair of brackets should be added to ensure correct operator orders: h2(k) ::= ((k + 64) mod (m/2) ) | 1 ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_8219 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_8290
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: BIL_Read_0x2A29 ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/BUILTINLIST/c/inc/BuiltInList.h line 879 Requirement is satisfied here: BIL_SetDiagProt ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/BUILTINLIST/c/src/BuiltInList.c line 395
Requirement is not verified 0x2A29 - DiagProt Gateway Component List DiagProt
This service reads from the Built-in list the list of DiagProt parameter for all nodes
Init Values: 1st entry (ICAS1): Value 0x11 > ISO-TP + IP Rest of entries: 0x00
After Built-In List generation: IF [Occupied entries] NodeAddress != 0x00 AND BUSID != 0x00 -> DiagProt = 0x11 ELSE [Not Occupied entries] -> DiagProt = 0x00
After reception of KN: Based on DiagPfad: IF DiagPfad == 0 -> 0x11 ELSE 0x00
Remark: Configuration requirements for this identification are part of this document: in chapter 2.18.5.3.2 (Diagnostics ->Identification -> Built-in List -> Configuration) under Object SWR_ICAS1_GW_11480
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_8290 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_8268
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: BIL_Read_0x2A26 ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/BUILTINLIST/c/inc/BuiltInList.h line 775 Requirement is satisfied here: BIL_CyclicClamp15Poll ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/BUILTINLIST/c/src/BuiltInList.c line 495 Requirement is satisfied here: BIL_CyclicTimeoutCheck ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/BUILTINLIST/c/src/BuiltInList.c line 530
Requirement is not verified 0x2A26 - Istverbaut
This service reads from the Built-in list the list of Istverbaut parameter
Possible Values: [is built-in] = 1 [is not built-in] = 0
Init Values: 1st entry (ICAS1 and ICAS1_Evo): Value 0x1 Rest of entries: 0x00
In regards to the Istverbaut parameter, the ICAS1 and ICAS1_Evo shall:
- Set the first bit of the Istverbaut always to [is built-in] (position corresponding to the ICAS1 and ICAS1_Evo) - After the generation of Built-In list has been completed, the actual installation is set to [is built-in] by the received node messages. - If the KN_ frame corresponding to a Built-in entry is not received within 700ms +/- 5% then Istverbaut set to [is not built-in].
Remark: Configuration requirements for this identification are part of this document: in chapter 2.18.5.3.2 (Diagnostics ->Identification -> Built-in List -> Configuration) under Object SWR_ICAS1_GW_11480
The Istverbaut parameter has no dependency with the Nachlauftyp. The Istverbaut will be set to [is not built-in] for those ECUs in the Built-in List during KL15 OFF if we don´t receive KN frames for more than 700ms (But for these cases the DTC will not be set, as described in Network Failure Detection chapter).
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_8268 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_8270
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: BIL_Read_0x2A28 ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/BUILTINLIST/c/inc/BuiltInList.h line 845
Requirement is not verified 0x2A28 - KD_Bit
This service reads from the Built-in list the list of KD_bit parameter.
Possible Values: [Error] = 1 [no Error] = 0
The ICAS1 shall set the KD_Bit bit of each Built-in list entry as follows:
- Init Values: All positions = [no Error]
- [Error] - If the KD_Bit for a KN_frame is received with [Error], the ICAS1 sets the corresponding KD_Bit in the Built-in List to [Error]
- [no Error] - If the KD_Bit for a KN_frame is received with [no Error], the ICAS1 shall set the corresponding KD_Bit in the Built-in List to [no Error] OR - If the Istverbaut is [is not built-in], the KD_Bit is set to [no Error]
Note: The fist bit of 0x2A28 is the ICAS1 KD_Bit.
Remark: Configuration requirements for this identification are part of this document: in chapter 2.18.5.3.2 (Diagnostics ->Identification -> Built-in List -> Configuration) under Object SWR_ICAS1_GW_11480
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_8270 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_8271
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: BIL_GetKDbitsCount ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/BUILTINLIST/c/inc/BuiltInList.h line 1049
Requirement is not verified KD_Fehler in the ICAS1 KN frame
The ICAS1 shall output the signal so_ICAS1_KD_Fehler of KN_Gateway according to the Datenfestlegung with the content - [Error] if at least one bit in 0x2A28 is equal to [Error] > ("OR" operation of all bits in 0x2A28) - [No Error] if all the bits in 0x2A28 are equal to [No Error]
Note: KN_Gateway.ICAS1_KD_Fehler is different from Systeminfo_01.ICAS1_KD_Fehler. Systeminfo_01.ICAS1_KD_Fehler = First bit of 0x2A28
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_8271 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_8272
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: BIL_Read_0x2A27 ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/BUILTINLIST/c/inc/BuiltInList.h line 810 Requirement is satisfied here: BIL_SetSleepIndicationBit ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/BUILTINLIST/c/src/BuiltInList.c line 428
Requirement is not verified 0x2A27 - Sleep-Indication
This service reads from the Built-in list the list of Sleep-Indication parameter.
Possible Values: [ready to sleep] = 1 [not ready to sleep] = 0
The ICAS1 shall set the Sleep-Indication bit of each Built-in list entry as follows:
- Init Values: At the beginning of an Operation-Cycle, the ICAS1 sets the Sleep-indication attribute of the Built-in List to following values: First position (ICAS1) = [not ready to sleep] All other positions = [ready to sleep]
1) GW´s own Sleep-indication bit (First bit in Sleep-Indication)
- [ready to sleep] the ICAS1 sets this Sleep-Indication bit (corresponding to the GW) to [ready to sleep] when all these conditions are fulfilled: - SW-KL 15 Off - Busses are asleep
2) All Sleep-indication bits, except the first one (GW)
- [not ready to sleep] the ICAS1 sets the Sleep-Indication bit in the corresponding Built-in List entry position to [not ready to sleep] when: - the NMH_Frame for a Built-in List entry was received the last 500ms +/- 5%, the ICAS1. (For any value of Nachlauftyp) - If Nachlauftyp = 0x0, the Sleep-Indication is [not ready to sleep] while KL15 ON and the last KN_ frame was received during the last 700ms +/- 5%
- [ready to sleep] the ICAS1 sets the Sleep-Indication bit in the corresponding Built-in List entry position to [ready to sleep] when: - The conditions to set the bit to [not ready to sleep] are not fulfilled
Remark: Configuration requirements for this identification are part of this document: in chapter 2.18.5.3.2 (Diagnostics ->Identification -> Built-in List -> Configuration) under Object SWR_ICAS1_GW_11480
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_8272 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_8274
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: BIL_Read_0x2EE0 ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/BUILTINLIST/c/inc/BuiltInList.h line 948 Requirement is satisfied here: BIL_SetBILExtDefaultValues ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/BUILTINLIST/c/src/BuiltInList.c line 229
Requirement is not verified 0x2EE0 - DiagPath (DiagPfad)
This service reads from the Built-in list the list of DiagPath parameter.
Possible Values: [not diagnosticable] = 1 [diagnosticable] = 0
- Init Values: At the beginning of an Operation-Cycle, the ICAS1 sets the DiagPfad attribute of the Built-in List to following values: First position (ICAS1) = [diagnosticable] All other positions = [not diagnosticable]
The ICAS1 shall set the DiagPath bit of each Built-in list entry as follows: - First position (ICAS1) always to [diagnosticable] - [not diagnosticable] IF the signal "Diagpfad" of the corresponding KN_ frame is received with the value [not diagnosticable]
- [diagnosticable] if the signal "Diagpfad" of the corresponding KN_ frame is received with the value [diagnosticable]
Remark: Configuration requirements for this identification are part of this document: in chapter 2.18.5.3.2 (Diagnostics ->Identification -> Built-in List -> Configuration) under Object SWR_ICAS1_GW_11480
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_8274 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_8275
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: BIL_RebuildBIL ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/BUILTINLIST/c/src/BuiltInList.c line 265
Requirement is not verified Nachlauftyp
Init Values First position (ICAS1) = 0x02 All other positions = 0x00
The ICAS1 shall store in a reset-proof manner before going to Stop Operating mode, the Nachlauftyp attribute of each Built-in List entry the value of the signal Nachlauftyp received in the corresponding KN_ frame
Note: If the ICAS1 never received a value of Nachlauftyp for an entry of the Built-in list, the ICAS1 will not perform the "Istverbaut" monitoring during KL15 OFF
Note: This Information is not readable via Diagnosis. ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_8275 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_8276
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: BIL_Init ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/BUILTINLIST/c/inc/BuiltInList.h line 454 Requirement is satisfied here: BIL_Read_0x2EE1 ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/BUILTINLIST/c/inc/BuiltInList.h line 983 Requirement is satisfied here: BIL_SetAuthenticity ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/BUILTINLIST/c/src/BuiltInList.c line 363 Requirement is satisfied here: TOOL_NUMBER ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/BUILTINLIST/c/src/BuiltInList.c line 835 Requirement is satisfied here: BIL_SetAuthenticity ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/BUILTINLIST/c/src/BuiltInList.c line 889 Requirement is satisfied here: if ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/BUILTINLIST/c/src/BuiltInList.c line 1000 Requirement is satisfied here: BIL_SetSleepIndicationBit ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/BUILTINLIST/c/src/BuiltInList.c line 1175 Requirement is satisfied here: BIL_KnRcvCb ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/BUILTINLIST/c/src/BuiltInList.c line 1290 Requirement is satisfied here: if ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/BUILTINLIST/c/src/BuiltInList.c line 1364
Requirement is not verified 0x2EE1 - Authenticity
This service reads from the Built-in list the list of Authenticity parameter.
Possible Values: [AUTHENTICITY_OCCUPIED] = 0 [AUTHENTICITY_UNOCCUPIED] = 1
Init Values: All positions = [AUTHENTICITY_OCCUPIED]
After Built-In List generation: IF NodeAddress == 0x00 -> [AUTHENTICITY_UNOCCUPIED] ELSE: [AUTHENTICITY_OCCUPIED]
Remark: Configuration requirements for this identification are part of this document: in chapter 2.18.5.3.2 (Diagnostics ->Identification -> Built-in List -> Configuration) under Object SWR_ICAS1_GW_11480
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_8276 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_8277
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: BIL_Read_0x04A3 ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/BUILTINLIST/c/inc/BuiltInList.h line 705 Requirement is satisfied here: BIL_Write_0x04A3 ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/BUILTINLIST/c/inc/BuiltInList.h line 1163
Requirement is not verified 0x04A3 - Sollverbau
The Sollverbau defines the nodes which shall be present in the system configuration. This information is used to make the comparation between the components whics should be present in the system configuration, and the elements which are currently present, and detect errors
Sollverbau list shall be readable and writeable by means of DID 0x04A3 This DID is used to code which ECUs will be installed in the vehicle
Possible Values: [SHOULD_NOT_BE_BUILT_IN] = 0 [SHOULD_BE_BUILT_IN] = 1
Init Values: Before Sollverbau will be written First position (ICAS1) = [SHOULD_BE_BUILT_IN] All other positions = [SHOULD_NOT_BE_BUILT_IN]
Note: Unoccupied/undefined/reserved list positions have the value '0'. The service shall know the position of each system in the table. Solverbau is stored in NV-RAM.
Remark: Configuration requirements for this identification are part of this document: in chapter 2.18.5.3.2 (Diagnostics ->Identification -> Built-in List -> Configuration) under Object SWR_ICAS1_GW_11480
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_8277 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

simplesect.para: Requirement is not satisfied

Requirement is not verified When the ICAS1 and ICAS1_Evo receives a request to write the Sollverbau RDID 2E 04 A3 where the first position in (ICAS1 and ICAS1_Evo) is set to [SHOULD_NOT_BE_BUILT_IN] (this would define the ICAS1 and ICAS1_Evo as not built in).
then, the ICAS1 and ICAS1_Evo shall ignore the request and, depending on the addressing type: - In case of physical addressing, the ICAS1 and ICAS1_Evo responds with NRC 0x31 - In case of functional addressing, the ICAS1 and ICAS1_Evo does not send any response.
Remark: Configuration requirements for this identification are part of this document: in chapter 2.18.5.3.2 (Diagnostics ->Identification -> Built-in List -> Configuration) under Object SWR_ICAS1_GW_11480
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_8279 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_8303
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: BIL_ReportDTC0x300000 ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/BUILTINLIST/c/src/BuiltInList.c line 331
Requirement is not verified DTC 0x300000 The ICAS1 shall report DTC 0x300000 - as Qualified when it detects at least one entry in the Built-in List where Sollverbau = 0, but Istverbaut = [is built-in] - as Not Qualified when it detects all entries in the Built-in List where Sollverbau = 0 have also Istverbaut = [is not built-in]
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_8303 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

simplesect.para: Requirement is not satisfied

Requirement is not verified The ICAS1 shall report DTC 0x300000 during list position calculation - as Qualified when no free list position can be assigned to a node
Remark: Problem of enabling/disabling DTC 300000 from different reasons is known and accepted as sporadic by VW: DTC 300 000 can be set when: - no free position on Built-In List - Node is not coded but it's Istverbauit is set. It means that in scenario: activation condition A -> Activation condition B -> Deactivation cond. A DTC will be deactivated, BUT Activation condition B will be still valid. Accepted by Mr Erik Hahn from VW site. (link to clarification from Mr Erik Hahn in VW-Jira added)
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_11751 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM
